reviews.review_msg: I would not recommend this course! He is not able to motivate the students and doesn't even seem nice. Avoid this professor!!!

generally to caught up in his own way of looking at everything. he's not able to create any form of motivation, and students are just waiting to get out of this class. he is not very helpul when questions arize, and his assignments are pretty much useless realated to the cource content. overall a horrible experience being in that class

Clear expectations and always accessible if you need clarification on class materials.  Quite a bit of reading but not impossible to manage.  The topics discussed are highly useful in the work environment.  No surprises on the exam but do require you to really understand the materials.  Lectures are funny with lot of stories, so you won't get bored
